<blockquote>
<h2 style="font-weight: 200;">Welcome to Chambers Choice Drilling</h2>
</blockquote>
<p style="text-align: justify;">
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			<p itemprop="text">Reach the pinnacle of home or land ownership with your own water supply! Private water wells are a superb way to get off the grid and rely on Mother Nature for your liquid life source. Water wells afford owners the comfort and security that they have a reliable water supply with consistent quality. No matter the use, whether for home drinking water or land irrigation, a private water well is your best choice.<br/><br/>

With over 40 years’ combined experience, Chambers Choice Drilling of Twentynine Palms, CA provides comprehensive water well services. From drilling to maintenance, we can be your partners in water for years to come. We have extensive experience in accessing groundwater in the area and understanding the unique characteristics of the land. We can analyze your property to make sure it will meet your water supply needs.<br/><br/>

Drilling is the first step. A proper well is excavated to a depth that meets government regulations and accesses the water table while accounting for slight depletion. This is especially important for areas subject to drought.
</p>
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			
<h2>Safe & Reliable</h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><p itemprop="text">Once we finish drilling your well, we can provide you with our specialized services to safely maintain it for you. You can count on our reliable maintenance services to ensure you are getting good water pressure and a crisp, clean water supply. Regular cleanings and annual checkups are a must to retain the quality of your water well.<br/><br/>

Our reputation for diligent work and prompt completion of projects has earned us a top position in the industry. We strive to keep our customers informed of the latest developments in water well construction and maintenance. Water is too important a resource not to give it the utmost attention. Call Chambers Choice Drilling, located in Twentynine Palms, CA, to start your project now!
</p>

<blockquote>
<h2 style="font-weight: 200;">Welcome to Chambers Choice Drilling</h2>
</blockquote>
<p style="text-align: justify;">
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			<p itemprop="text">Reach the pinnacle of home or land ownership with your own water supply! Private water wells are a superb way to get off the grid and rely on Mother Nature for your liquid life source. Water wells afford owners the comfort and security that they have a reliable water supply with consistent quality. No matter the use, whether for home drinking water or land irrigation, a private water well is your best choice.<br/><br/>

With over 40 years’ combined experience, Chambers Choice Drilling of Twentynine Palms, CA provides comprehensive water well services. From drilling to maintenance, we can be your partners in water for years to come. We have extensive experience in accessing groundwater in the area and understanding the unique characteristics of the land. We can analyze your property to make sure it will meet your water supply needs.<br/><br/>

Drilling is the first step. A proper well is excavated to a depth that meets government regulations and accesses the water table while accounting for slight depletion. This is especially important for areas subject to drought.
</p>
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			
<h2>Safe & Reliable</h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><p itemprop="text">Once we finish drilling your well, we can provide you with our specialized services to safely maintain it for you. You can count on our reliable maintenance services to ensure you are getting good water pressure and a crisp, clean water supply. Regular cleanings and annual checkups are a must to retain the quality of your water well.<br/><br/>

Our reputation for diligent work and prompt completion of projects has earned us a top position in the industry. We strive to keep our customers informed of the latest developments in water well construction and maintenance. Water is too important a resource not to give it the utmost attention. Call Chambers Choice Drilling, located in Twentynine Palms, CA, to start your project now!
</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			<p itemprop="text">Reach the pinnacle of home or land ownership with your own water supply! Private water wells are a superb way to get off the grid and rely on Mother Nature for your liquid life source. Water wells afford owners the comfort and security that they have a reliable water supply with consistent quality. No matter the use, whether for home drinking water or land irrigation, a private water well is your best choice.<br/><br/>

With over 40 years’ combined experience, Chambers Choice Drilling of Twentynine Palms, CA provides comprehensive water well services. From drilling to maintenance, we can be your partners in water for years to come. We have extensive experience in accessing groundwater in the area and understanding the unique characteristics of the land. We can analyze your property to make sure it will meet your water supply needs.<br/><br/>

Drilling is the first step. A proper well is excavated to a depth that meets government regulations and accesses the water table while accounting for slight depletion. This is especially important for areas subject to drought.
</p>
		</div> <!-- .et_pb_text --><div class="et_pb_text et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left">
			
<h2>Safe & Reliable</h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><p itemprop="text">Once we finish drilling your well, we can provide you with our specialized services to safely maintain it for you. You can count on our reliable maintenance services to ensure you are getting good water pressure and a crisp, clean water supply. Regular cleanings and annual checkups are a must to retain the quality of your water well.<br/><br/>

Our reputation for diligent work and prompt completion of projects has earned us a top position in the industry. We strive to keep our customers informed of the latest developments in water well construction and maintenance. Water is too important a resource not to give it the utmost attention. Call Chambers Choice Drilling, located in Twentynine Palms, CA, to start your project now!
</p>

USDOT Status
  • ACTIVE: The entity's US DOT number is active.
  • INACTIVE: Inactive per 49 CFR 390.19(b)(4); biennial update of MCS-150 data not completed.
  • OUT-OF-SERVICE: Carrier is under any type of out-of-service order and is not authorized to operate.
Operating Authority Status
  • AUTHORIZED FOR { Passenger, Property, HHG }: This will list the specific operating authorities the carrier (or broker) is allowed to operate.
  • NOT AUTHORIZED: The entity does not have any operating authority and/or is not authorized to engage in interstate, for-hire operations.
    *Please Note: NOT AUTHORIZED does not apply to Private or Intrastate operations.
  • OUT-OF-SERVICE: Carrier is under any type of out-of-service order and is not authorized to operate.
